channel.title: Hadoop on 大王派我来搬砖
channel.description: Recent content in Hadoop on 大王派我来搬砖

item.title: python hadoop
item.author: 1031846289@qq.com (wxy1688)
item.description: pip install mrjob from mrjob.job import MRJob class MRWordFrequencyCount(MRJob): def mapper(self, _, line): yield "chars", len(line) yield "words", len(line.split()) yield "lines", 1 def reducer(self, key, values): yield key, sum(values) if __name__ == '__main__': MRWordFrequencyCount.run()
